Package xing.ui

Class Plot

  • java.lang.Object
    • xing.ui.Plot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Plot
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SolutionPlot
    public class Plot
extends java.lang.Object
implements Plot, Drawable
    Plot implementation, which itself is also a shape so that it can be drawn onto some Canvas instance.
